directions: Combine all ingredients, reserving half the crab meat and some sauce. Spoon onto Original or Sesame Pretzel Crisps(R) and garnish with more sauce and crab.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can lump crabmeat, drained, divided
1 (7.2 ounce) package Original or Sesame Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
title: Crab Rangoon Dip
